snippet: Kawhi Leonard scored 27 points as the San Antonio Spurs beat the Detroit Pistons, 97-81, on Wednesday to clinch their 19th straight playoff berth.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Detroit Pistons, 97-81, to clinch playoff berth; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kawhi Leonard scored 27 points as the San Antonio Spurs beat the Detroit Pistons, 97-81, on Wednesday to clinch their 19th straight playoff berth.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Spurs Clinch Playoff Berth
